channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report E-2025020196
item.description:
Report E-2025020196

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-15T03:17:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-13
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On February 13, 2025, four (4) 5-gallon pails of paint were damaged and released approximately six (6) gallons of paint to the trailer interior and dock floor. R+L retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from EnviroServe (ES) to remediate the site. The crew utilized absorbents and hand tools to containerize waste in one (1) 55-gallon drum. The damaged pails were overpacked in one (1) 55-gallon drum.
